sense.def:
Država ali oseba, ki je
neutral
, ne podpira nobene strani v sporu ali vojni.

seg.quote: Because I was neutral in the conflict I was a welcome visitor.
We have a tradition of political neutrality.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
neutral
ali kadar je
neutral
tisto, kar naredi, ne kaže čustev ali mnenj.

seg.quote: I waited, but her eyes were neutral.
‘Look,’ she said in a neutral voice.

sense.def:
Neutral
je položaj sklopke pri vozilu takrat, ko ni povezana z motorjem.

seg.quote: I pushed the handle into neutral.

sense.def:
Žica, ki je pri električni napeljavi
neutral
, ni niti ozemljitev niti živi vod, pač pa je potrebna, da se tokokrog sklene.
